nodes.text: Star Wars Galactic Stories: 7 Stories from a Galaxy Far, Far Away....

Star Wars Galactic Stories: 7 Stories from a Galaxy Far, Far Away.... is a canon young-readers storybook collection. The collected stories include "Escape from Darth Vader"; "The Battle of Hoth," adapted from AT-AT Attack!; "Do or Do Not," adapted from Use the Force!; "Rescue from Jabba's Palace"; "Ewoks Join the Fight"; "A Friend for Rey"; and "Rathtars on the Loose!". It was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on June 27, 2016.
